org.spf4j.avro.csv

Class CsvEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.avro.io.Encoder
      • org.spf4j.avro.csv.CsvEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Flushable, org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Parser.ActionHandler

    public final class CsvEncoder
extends org.apache.avro.io.Encoder
implements org.apache.avro.io.parsing.Parser.ActionHandler
    A Csv decoder for avro records.
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas
